title: rclone tree --sort-ctime ---- gdrive --- crashing
body:
Hello,

rclone crashes when sorting by creation time of files on a google drive. Am i using wrong the command or is it a bug?
both stable and beta.

thanks!

`2017/11/05 10:18:15 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/vlcrec/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2017/11/05 10:18:15 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.38-083-g68d0b5adÎ²" starting with parameters ["rclone" "tree" "-vv" "--sort-ctime" "--noindent" "-o" "/tmp/aici" "remote:seriale"]
